TopicTitle: Keeping Parachutes Apart and Deployment Animation in Mushroom Form

Articles.Content:
Has anyone ever been able to create a mod that keeps separate parachute canopies apart?  I heard that was a feature of 1.12, but I'm not seeing it.  Maybe because I have RealChutes installed?

Also, what is the mod that makes parachutes open in a sort of mushroom shape as some do in real life?  Open with a small opening then eventually fully inflate.

On 6/19/2022 at 9:16 AM, Probus said:

Also, what is the mod that makes parachutes open in a sort of mushroom shape as some do in real life?  Open with a small opening then eventually fully inflate.

For this restock does great! I don't know how'd you feel abt playing it, but I would 100% reccomend

Advanced tweakables enables an additional feature of parachutes- spread angle. You can set this higher to make all parachutes in a symmetry set spread out more, or less so they cluster together, but it only affects chutes in one set, placed together using symmetry in the editor.
